metadata.Title: CVE-2017-6310 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium.
metadata.Description:
An issue was discovered in tnef before 1.4.13. Four type confusions have been identified in the file_add_mapi_attrs() function. These might lead to invalid read and write operations, controlled by an attacker.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2017-6310` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

tnef - 1.4.9-1+deb8u2build0.14.04.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: tnef package in trusty was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1.4.9-1+deb8u2build0.14.04.1').
